itunes:title: spilling the ~influencer~ tea with Libby Christensen
title: spilling the ~influencer~ tea with Libby Christensen
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
take off your pumpcovers, because this week's guest is here to spill some piping hot *lukewarm* tea with the fun & gains fam. Libby Christensen joins Britt to chat about influencer culture, how to become a content creator, embarrassing gym stories, brand deals & sponsorships, owning a business, & so much more!

15:20 all things content creation

28:40 negatives of being an influencer

31:20 You asked, Britt & Libby spill the tea

1:24:10 Libby’s parting advice
